body_html: The problem is not with not recording the casts, but with the fact that we only record traces in C++ and at that point the arguments to arange are simply int64_t. We need to extend ArgumentStash to work with int arguments too if you want to fix it.
body_text: The problem is not with not recording the casts, but with the fact that we only record traces in C++ and at that point the arguments to arange are simply int64_t. We need to extend ArgumentStash to work with int arguments too if you want to fix it.
body: The problem is not with not recording the casts, but with the fact that we only record traces in C++ and at that point the arguments to arange are simply `int64_t`. We need to extend ArgumentStash to work with int arguments too if you want to fix it.
